website_summaries.verdict: These super-fuzzy and soft wildlife toys are an excellent consolation prize if your dog is still fuming over the squirrel they’ll never catch.
pros: Remarkably realistic design, ultra-plush fur and soft design
Meets child toy safety standards, so a good pick for homes with small children
A great size for all dogs
cons: Some dogs may not appreciate a mouthful of fur – not a chew toy

customer_reviews.title: May Lead To Hunter/Hunted Issue
customer_reviews.text: The rabbit had a terrible and cruel welcome into this world. As I removed him from his restraints, I delivered him to the jowls of my beast and in seconds the poor guy was nothing more than faux fur and cotton guts. Everywhere cotton guts. The carnage was unsubstantiated and I now fear that my dog would not only do this to a real rabbit, but sometimes it feels like she’s hunting ME.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased one of these toys at Cabela’s dog loved it. We needed new ones and saw them on here and purchased two of them. The fur comes off and our dog chokes on them.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Klug

customer_reviews.title: It's a hit with my cat!
customer_reviews.text: First off, yes I realize this is a dog toy, but my cat loves stuffed rabbits and I wanted a durable one this time. That said, the first thing I noticed upon opening the package was a STRONG scent of men's cologne. Like, really strong obviously cologne, as though it were stored with cologne for a long time. I gave it a quick light washing with a lightly damp sponge which helped some. However, my cat seems to love the scent... go figure. I mean, he will not let this bunny go for even a second. He's in love - so I'm happy regardless of the odd scent.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Still working good quality.
customer_reviews.text: One month in still has working squeaker. A liitle torn up by my lab but still a favorite of hers. Small separation around head neck area. Only complaint is size. A lttle small for a 75 black lab. About 7 inches in length.
customer_reviews.author: C. Parillo

customer_reviews.title: My dog's favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: I recommend the raccoon wildlife critter to anyone with a dog that likes to pull stuffing out of toys. It took several days for my dog to actually get some stuffing out of the raccoon and he played with it a lot. Every other toy I've bought him lasts less than a day. This is by far his favorite toy to play with so I have bought him more than one.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Lucas loves it!
customer_reviews.text: In a continuous search for indestructible dog toys, I tried this one. It is very sturdy and well made, and has held up well. Lucas has only had this a few weeks, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Kim D.

customer_reviews.title: It is cute enough for a child, but gets eaten by a dog
customer_reviews.text: It is cute, soft & detailed enough it could be a child's toy. But it is not better than other dog squeaky toys. It is average in many ways. I think people will like how it looks and feels but I don't know that my dog likes it anymore than the cheaper ones I buy that are the same size & squeak the same. My dog tore it apart and removed the squeaker. He really enjoyed removing the stuffing, but he has other squeaky toys that aren't so easily destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Aryeh

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute and  dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: It's held up well. I do wish it was a bit bigger in size. It's cute and my dog hasn't chewed apart any seems yet (give him time and he'll get holes in everything)...but this has held up and lasted against a chewer. When something this cute and well made, I'd like to see it in a larger size. (more real raccoon size - instead of small baby raccoon size). Hopefully they will make a LARGER SIZE VERSION of it.... if we ask enough for it.
customer_reviews.author: horse3nut

customer_reviews.title: Good product, squeaky which my dog loved but didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product, squeaky which my dog loved but didn't stand up to even 10 minutes of chewing before she tore it open and started eating the filling in inside. Since then we emptied out the filling and squeaky and just gave outside fur and that's gone fine.
customer_reviews.author: E. Vena

customer_reviews.title: Not Good for a 80 lb Black Lab
customer_reviews.text: The dog loved the toy, but it didn't take her long to tear it apart.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Stein

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my dog wanted
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12 year old cocker spaniel that only ever liked one toy. After several years and as many dozen washes, he finally tore the leg off. I spent months searching for a replacement, and this is that replacement. It's a little smaller than his original rabbit toy, but the fabric is the same. Most importantly, he picked it up and played with it like it was his old toy. My dog is clearly not as destructive as other reviewers', but I'm happy, my dog's happy, and if he wasn't so old I'd have bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Winters

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: We have four month old schnauzer puppy and the rabbit version starting falling apart after two weeks. It has come apart at the seams, hair is falling off, etc. The pup really enjoyed the toy, but if you plan on purchasing, make sure you purchase two. This item will not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C. Butti

customer_reviews.title: Bought it again
customer_reviews.text: Dog loved the first one I got and lost it after years of use. I worried that the dog would not take to a new one but it was happy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Keith Burton

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Constructed - NOT for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Badly made, flimsy and definitely NOT a "dog toy"! Destroyed in under 90 seconds...!!
customer_reviews.author: H. R.

customer_reviews.title: A Bunny for all Seasons.
customer_reviews.text: The Beagle gives it 4 Woofs. The MinPen gives it 0 - cuz, she can't get it away from the Beagle. The Beagle would have gone 5 Woofs - but, he's had issues finding the squeaker. It's held up well - so far. No stuffing on the carpet, yet.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget-Guy

customer_reviews.title: Broken Squeaker
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, the squeaker did not work. This is the 4th one of this type of toy my corgi has, and she loves them. Her favorite thing is to run around ,being chased, and squeaking the toys. She will still play with this one, just not as much as the others. These toys are generally a '5'. The defect brought it's rating down.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineB

customer_reviews.title: Ripped open 3 days later
customer_reviews.text: My 20 pound dog loved this toy until it completely ripped open three days later. We even traveled one of those days so really she only played with it two or three times. Would not recommend and slightly frustrated that a dog toy company wouldn't make heir dog toys more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: The dog loved it. He ripped the squeaker of the first ...
customer_reviews.text: The dog loved it. He ripped the squeaker of the first day. After a little sew repair, it is now his bedtime friend.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Not for large dogs
customer_reviews.text: The product description says large...... I don't know what they use to measure these but it is very small. If I had a small dog this would be perfect, but for a German Shepard it is way to small. It is a nice toy other than the size.
customer_reviews.author: JJbean

customer_reviews.title: Durable and washable
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the most durable, washable, and favorite of the toys!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable enough
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved it when he got it, but he destroyed it within minutes. I have been searching the world wide for a durable plush toy. I've given up and decided to only get the stuffing-less soft toys.
customer_reviews.author: WH

customer_reviews.title: It’s the only toy my dog will play with.
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were gone until we found them under a new name. Thank you (from our dog!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy loves this toy! She thinks it's alive and totes it everywhere she goes! Great quality and perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Cbarr

customer_reviews.title: sharing the stuffing.
customer_reviews.text: if you have a pet that enjoys sharing the stuffing of his toys... this is not the toy for you. it was a carcass within an hour. but the dog has enjoyed dragging around the de-stuffed animal ..
customer_reviews.author: Mrs63ne

customer_reviews.title: ... with it every day and it is still in great
customer_reviews.text: dogs play with it every day and it is still in great condition
customer_reviews.author: pac

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 12 hous
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy for my 6 month old coonhound puppy. Destroyed in less than 12 hours. I have bought her other toys that she loves that are 4 months old and just fine.
customer_reviews.author: David Ingalls

customer_reviews.title: My pug loves bunnies. This one lasted until my ...
customer_reviews.text: My pug loves bunnies. This one lasted until my big dogs got it. But he still loves the ragged body.
customer_reviews.author: zephyr

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My poodle loves it & it's the only one that has remained in tact!! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Xena

customer_reviews.title: my aussie loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog tears up ALL toys in less than an hour-we have had this one for weeks now. She loves it and hasnt destroyed it yet!
customer_reviews.author: Carole Pisani

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second chipmunk. My dog loves it!!!! So real looking.
customer_reviews.author: wheatie

customer_reviews.title: Okay for non aggresive chewers
customer_reviews.text: My dog ripped the squeak out in like 45 seconds. :( It is really cute and she still likes to carry it around.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: great fun
customer_reviews.text: the dog loves this toy. hours of fun for both of us. great for a small apartment or outside play.
customer_reviews.author: gtw

customer_reviews.title: Both dogs favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: The chipmunk is both of my dogs favorite toy. They have two over flowing baskets and this is the one they have out daily. I also bought the rabbit after next and they like it just as much. I have a lab and an Australian Shepard. The tail of the toy makes it easy for me to play with them without having to touch the main body that they carry in their mouths.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality Dog toy.  Junk
customer_reviews.text: My 13 pound rat terrier was pulling the fur off of it within 30 minutes. It was making a huge mess. We threw it away immediately. I have other plush dog toys that have better quality material that my dog is not able to shred. I will not be buying this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: My shih tzu loves this toy. It is his absolute favorite. I like the fact that he cannot chew the squeaker out of the toy, like he does with so many others. Hours of fun so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Ann Mcfadden

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: My pug tore the tail off and was into the stuffing after three hours of owning this. The fur rips out easily so he's constantly hacking now. Avoid this cheap thing.
customer_reviews.author: David Girard

product_meta.title: Hyper Pet Wildlife Critters Plush Dog Toys
product_meta.description: Style:RabbitHyper pet wildlife Critter dog toys are realistic looking rabbit plush, squeaking toys great for all sizes of dogs.
feature_bullets: Realistic looking, plush toy your fur baby will adore
Meet or exceeds child toy safety standards, so you can feel confident about giving this to your dog
Squeakers included to stimulate interest and keep you pup occupied
Age range description: All Life Stages

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
